title: Advances in String Theory in Curved Space Times
abstract: String Quantum Gravity is motivated and introduced. Advances in the study of the classical and quantum string dynamics in curved spacetime are reported: 1-New Classes of Exact Multistring solutions in curved spacetimes. 2-Mass spectrum of Strings in Curved Spacetimes. 3-The effect of a Cosmological Constant and of Spacial Curvature on Classical and Quantum Strings. 4-Classical splitting of Fundamental Strings. 5-The General String Evolution in constant Curvature Spacetimes. 6-The Conformal Invariance Effects.
